means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 斯诺绰号，白发者，来源于古英语，含义是“雪”(snow)

word_mean: 雪,水蒸气在低于冰点(0℃)的温度下凝结成的冰冻混合物，由分离的小颗粒或结晶组成
雪, 由冰晶聚合而形成的固态降水。
雪冰, ice 水冻结成小块冰结晶体后，排除未结晶水制成的人造冰。

sentence.Network_cn: 雪花轻盈飘落，无声无息。

jx.jx_en_mean: (常作be snowed under)overwhelm someone with a large quantity of something, especially work
jx.jx_cn_mean: (因某物，尤指大量的工作）使某人忙得不可开交

lj.lj_ly: he's been snowed under with urgent cases.
lj.lj_ls: 这些紧急的案子让他忙得不可开交。

lj.lj_ly: I was snowed under with work.

jx.jx_en_mean: To defeat by a very large margin.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 压倒：以极大的优势击败

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English snāw, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch sneeuw and German Schnee, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin nix, niv- and Greek nipha

entry.def: Snow consists of a lot of soft white bits of frozen water that fall from the sky in cold weather.

example.ex: In Mid-Wales six inches of snow blocked roads...
example.tran: 在威尔士的中部地区，6英寸厚的大雪阻塞了道路。

example.ex: They tramped through the falling snow.
example.tran: 他们在纷飞的大雪里艰难前行。

entry.def: You can refer to a great deal of snow in an area as the snows .

example.ex: As the snows melt, the flood waters rise.
example.tran: 雪融化的时候，洪水会上涨。

entry.def: When it snows, snow falls from the sky.

example.ex: It had been snowing all night.

entry.tran: 用花言巧语鼓动(或迷惑)
entry.def: If someone snows you, they persuade you to do something or convince you of something by flattering or deceiving you.

example.ex: I'd been a fool letting him snow me with his big ideas.
example.tran: 我真蠢，居然被他的胡乱吹嘘给蒙蔽了。

means.word_mean: 1. precipitation falling from clouds in the form of ice crystals
2. a layer of snowflakes (white crystals of frozen water) covering the ground
2. conceal one's true motives from especially by elaborately feigning good intentions so as to gain an end;

sentences.sentence: "He bamboozled his professors into thinking that he knew the subject well"

sentences.en: The lofty mountains were crowned with snow.

sentences.en: The letters snowed to the editorial department.

jushi.english: It will not take long for the melted snow to soak into the soil.
jushi.chinese: 不用多久融雪就会渗入土壤。

jushi.english: The river has swollen with melted snow.
I was so excited to see snow that I was indifferent to the cold.
jushi.chinese: 我看到雪激动得连寒冷都不在乎了。
